title: In San Franciso any person classified as ugly may not legally walk down any street.
In Arkansas you cannot honk your horn next to a subway shop after 9pm.
In Arizona you cannot let your donkey sleep in the bathtub.
In Colorado you cannot keep a couch on your porch.
In Connecticut if a pickle doesn't bounce, you cannot sell it.
In Indiana you cannot ride a horse faster than 10 mph.
In Louisiana you can't surprise someone with a pizza
In Maine you can't park in front of a Dunkin' Donuts.
In Michigan you can't sell a car on a Sunday.
In Missiouri you cannot wrestle a bear.
In New Hampshire you cannot take seaweed from the beach.
In North Carolina you cannot drink and play bingo.
In Tennessee you cannot share your Netflix password.
In Delaware it is illegal to whisper in church.
In Georgia it is illegal to eat fried chicken with a fork and knife.
In Montana it is illegal to have a pet rat.
In Mesquite, Texas it is illegal for kids to have unusual haircuts.
In Texas it is illegal to milk another persons cow.
In Texas you can be legally married by publically introducing a person as your spouse 3 times.
In Texas you cannot take more than three sips of beer while standing.
In Kentucky it is illegal to cook eggs with an eye patch.
In Utah it is illegal to go hiking with an umbrella.
In California it is illegal to surf with a baseball cap.
In New York it is illegal to not finish a slice of pizza.
In Virgina it is illegal to capture Fireflies.
In Ohio it is illegal to walk down the street without greeting a passerby.
In Florida it is against the law to fish with just a reel and no rod.
In Nebraska it is illegal to shovel snow with a spoon.
In Oregon it is illegal to roll a wagon on the Oregon Trail.
In Pennsylvania it is illegal to dress up as a vamprire after 6pm.
In Iowa it is illegal to spell the alphabet while singing.
In New York, New York it is illegal to walk down the street and shout 'I'm walkin here!'.
In Idaho it is illegal to deep fry potatoes.
In Mississippi it is illegal to submit any paperwork that misspells 'Mississippi'.
In Minnesota it is illegal to change a lightbulb unless you're a licensed electrician.
In Wisconsin it is a leagl requirement to smile at all times except at funerals or hospitals.
In Texas it is illegal to own a burial plot before you die.
In Nevada it is illegal to refuse your toilet to anyone who asks.
In Vermont It is illegal to give your first born a middle name.
In Hawaii it is illegal to not wear a lei at least once during your stay. Visitors are also banned from using the word 'aloha'.
